title: Mac "GPU Panic" crash
body:
So while playing LoL my macbook pro 2010 running OS X 10.something keeps crashing (basically restarting itself) and once booted back up it displayed this error report. Seems to be some sort of GPU panic.

Anyone have any ideas on how to fix this?
Anonymous UUID:       4EA88AC3-4264-8B7A-53F9-1144E6457B21

Sun Sep 27 16:54:49 2015
